title: The House That Dreams
description: A family moves into a house that sleeps—and every night it dreams new rooms into existence.

title: Skinwalker's Veil
description: A hunter discovers a creature wearing the skins of its victims, mimicking their voices perfectly.

title: Dead Air
description: A late-night radio host receives calls from people who claim they're already dead—and know when he'll die.

title: The Hollow Choir
description: Children begin singing a song no adult can hear, and those who join vanish at dawn.

title: Rotwood
description: A forest grows over an abandoned town, and the trees contain the bodies of the residents.

title: The Pale Visitor
description: A figure appears in photos decades apart, always watching, never aging.

title: Thirteen Doors
description: A man trapped in a house with thirteen locked doors learns each one opens into a different nightmare.

title: Bloodletter
description: A serial killer leaves letters predicting each murder—and they arrive before the victim is chosen.

title: The Doll Beneath the Stairs
description: A child's doll whispers secrets at night, and its face changes to resemble people who die nearby.

title: Quiet Hunger
description: Something beneath a rural town eats sound itself, and silence spreads like a plague.

title: The Faceless Widow
description: A ghost bride appears to those who are about to lose someone they love—and takes their face as tribute.

title: Basement 12
description: Hospital staff discover a sealed basement that houses patients no one remembers admitting.

title: The Unseen Roommate
description: College students hear footsteps and see items move, but campus records show their room was condemned.

title: Mothlight
description: A swarm of glowing moths descends on a town, and anyone who looks at their wings dies smiling.

title: The Last Broadcast
description: A TV station keeps airing shows with actors who died years earlier, performing events that haven't happened yet.

title: Marrowstone
description: A quarry produces stones that bleed and whisper, driving workers insane with visions of buried gods.

title: The Orchard of Bones
description: Trees grow skeletons instead of fruit, and at harvest they come alive hunger-driven.

title: Listen for Me
description: Voices beg for help through baby monitors in homes where no infants have ever lived.

title: Cold Guest
description: A mysterious figure visits houses during blizzards, leaving frostburn marks in the shape of hands.

title: When the Bell Rings
description: A cursed bell tolls each night, and whoever hears it dreams of their corpse—exactly as it will be found.

title: The Demonologist
description: A detailed account of Ed and Lorraine Warren’s investigations into real-life hauntings, possessions, and demonic activity.

title: In Cold Blood
description: A chilling true crime story about the brutal murder of a Kansas family, exploring the psychology of the killers and the impact on the community.

title: The Devil in the White City
description: The true story of serial killer H. H. Holmes during the 1893 Chicago World’s Fair, blending historical horror and true crime.

title: The Haunting of Hill House
description: A chilling story of a haunted mansion and the psychological terror experienced by its inhabitants, blending supernatural and psychological horror.

title: The Shining
description: A family becomes caretakers of an isolated hotel with a violent supernatural presence, driving the father into madness.

title: The Exorcist
description: Based on real-life exorcisms, a young girl becomes possessed by a demonic entity, prompting a battle between priests and the supernatural.

title: Hell House
description: Investigators enter the Belasco House, reputedly the most haunted house in the world, to uncover terrifying paranormal phenomena.

title: The Amityville Horror
description: A true account of a family experiencing horrifying supernatural events in their Long Island home, including poltergeist activity and demonic presence.
